title: Read queries failure rate is high
description: Read queries refer to database queries that are primarily focused on retrieving data from the database. This monitor checks for anomalies in the success rate of read queries for different nodes in a SingleStoreDB cluster.

definition.message: SingleStore read queries are failing more often on node {{singlestore_node_name.name}}.
definition.name: [SingleStore] Read queries failure rate is higher than before
definition.query: avg(last_4h):anomalies(avg:singlestore.successful_read_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_name,singlestore_node_id} / ( avg:singlestore.successful_read_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_name,singlestore_node_id} + avg:singlestore.failed_read_queries{*} by {singlestore_node_name,singlestore_node_id} ), 'agile', 5, direction='below', alert_window='last_15m', interval=60, count_default_zero='true', seasonality='daily') >= 1
